alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 20 at 1:48AM PST until December 22 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following area, Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A Pacific storm system will bring showers and chance of thunderstorms. The heavier and more widespread rainfall is expected for late Thursday into Friday when rainfall rates could reach one inch per hour. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
